pr_title: Prevent local classes from being written to stub files

timeline.message: Prevent local classes from being written

timeline.author: kelloggm
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -74,10 +74,14 @@
     private SceneToStubWriter() {}
 
     /**
-     * A pattern matching the name of an anonymous inner class, or a class nested within one. An
-     * anonymous inner class has a basename like Outer$1.
+     * A pattern matching the name of an anonymous inner class, a local class, or a class nested
+     * within one of these types of classes. An anonymous inner class has a basename like Outer$1
+     * and a local class has a basename like Oute$1Inner. See <a

revised_code.chunk: diff --git a/framework/src/main/java/org/checkerframework/common/wholeprograminference/SceneToStubWriter.java b/framework/src/main/java/org/checkerframework/common/wholeprograminference/SceneToStubWriter.java index 52c98f56b..32bf572bb 100644 --- a/framework/src/main/java/org/checkerframework/common/wholeprograminference/SceneToStubWriter.java +++ b/framework/src/main/java/org/checkerframework/common/wholeprograminference/SceneToStubWriter.java @@ -76,7 +76,7 @@ public final class SceneToStubWriter { /** * A pattern matching the name of an anonymous inner class, a local class, or a class nested * within one of these types of classes. An anonymous inner class has a basename like Outer$1 - * and a local class has a basename like Oute$1Inner. See Java Language * Specification, section 13.1. */
